body_html:
By "variable" you mean Tensor? Can you post the graph that actually gets generated?

I think, from looking at your code, that everything is working as intended; TensorFlow graphs need to uniquify the operation names somehow, so you specifying a name which conflicts with the name of something else in the graph will cause the name you specified to not actually be used.

body:
By "variable" you mean Tensor? Can you post the graph that actually gets generated?

I think, from looking at your code, that everything is working as intended; TensorFlow graphs need to uniquify the operation names somehow, so you specifying a name which conflicts with the name of something else in the graph will cause the name you specified to not actually be used.
